title: Rakovina Therapeutics and Variational AI Expand Collaboration to Advance Next-Generation ATR Inhibitors
description: VANCOUVER, British Columbia, Jan. 08, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Rakovina Therapeutics Inc. title: AI Set to Drive 50% Rise in Copper Demand by 2040
description: Artificial intelligence is emerging as a powerful new driver of global copper demand, intensifying supply constraints already caused by electrification, energy transition technologies, and long mine development timelines.
content:
Artificial intelligence could boost global copper demand by as much as 50% in the years to 2040, which will cause a supply squeeze due to the long lead times on new mines.
